keyword: how many calories in a ribeye
title: How Many Calories in a Ribeye Steak?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a ribeye steak (typical 8 oz serving), including protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Ribeye Steak?
assumptions: 8 oz (227 g) cooked ribeye steak, broiled without added fat, choice grade, trimmed of visible fat.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut size, grade, cooking method, added fats, and trimming; check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A typical 8 oz cooked ribeye steak provides ~661 kcal and ~55 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp butter during cooking per 100 g
Leaner select grade (vs. choice) per 100 g
Pan-seared with 1 tsp oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in a ribeye steak per 100 g?
faqs.a: About 291 kcal per 100 g cooked ribeye steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a ribeye?
faqs.a: A typical 8 oz serving has ~55 g protein.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in a ribeye?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”grilling or broiling keeps it lower; frying with oil adds 40+ kcal per tsp.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Around 50 g total fat for an 8 oz serving, with 20 g saturated.

faqs.q: Are ribeye steaks high in cholesterol?
faqs.a: Yes, ~186 mg in an 8 oz serving, mostly from the meat's natural content.
